products.title: WE MANUFACTURE SULFURIC ACID FOR ENTERPRISES OF OUR COUNTRY AND OWN NEEDS
products.content: At present, the Sulfuric Acid Production Workshop, which is one of the main components of the Navoiyuran State Enterprise, produces technical sulfuric acid (N2SO4) in accordance with GOST 2184-2013 and is used as the main raw material for the extraction of natural uranium. . It is also used as a raw material in the production of gold at the enterprises of Navoi Horse Metallurgical Plant JSC, Navoiyazot JSC and Navoi Thermal Power Plant JSC.

item_1.title: Sulfuric acid
item_1.content: Technical sulfuric acid (N2SO4) in accordance with GOST 2184-2013

item_2.title: Pipe products
item_2.content: Various corrosion and wear resistant tubular products are available

item_3.title: Mineral resources
item_3.content: Производится различная коррозионно- и абразивостойкая трубная продукция.

item_1.title: Navoi Uran
item_1.content: Uzbekistan entered the top five in uranium mining

item_2.title: Cities
item_2.content: The state enterprise "Navoiyuran" will operate 18 uranium deposits in the Navoi, Samarkand and Bukhara regions of the Republic of Uzbekistan with three uranium mining installations.

item_4.title: Stock
item_4.content: Uzbekistan is one of the leading uranium mining countries. Uranium reserves of the republic amount to 132.3 thousand tons (2% of world reserves)
